subject: Further Explanation my response on green
body:
Hello Mr David,

Thank you for reaching out to me with your proposal. I must say, it soundsquite intriguing. I appreciate your experience and expertise in the financialindustry. Retirement planning is definitely an important aspect of life, andit's great that you have been able to generate high profits for your clients. Thankyou very much for your appreciation I am sure we can partner together on thisproject.

I understand that you are offering me an opportunity to receive a significantamount of funds as my annual investment proceeds from Fidelity Marginal CapitalFund. It's interesting that you mentioned the fund will be sent via charitydonation to avoid government taxes. Could you please explain how this processworks? I want to make sure everything is legal and transparent. I have the trust or words of a renowned wealth management agent with Tdbank, tested and tried am sure he will deliver when it comes to delivering hispart without any doubt.

You also mentioned that there might be some minimal financial costs involved inthe claim process. Could you provide more details about these costs? I wouldlike to have a clear understanding of what expenses I would need to cover. Tobe honest to you the last time we did this it cost the EMRCP CLIENT plus minus $27,000,00to complete paperwork’s including bank clearance papers that was also procuredby the wealth manager legally and legitimately to the last, actually I wasthinking of directing you to him directly so he take it up with you to provideto you all necessary advise. I assure you we will never go wrong.

Furthermore, I would appreciate it if you could share more information aboutthe investment pattern or sharing options once the funds are transferred intomy account. What kind of investments do you typically recommend, and how wouldwe proceed with making those decisions? I have instructed my lawyer todraft a private agreement which we will both sign that will state all detailsin black and white first before we go to the wealth manager so upon hearingfrom you, I will need the below details 

1.      Your house or office address

 2.      Any of your valididentification document.

 3.      You company name and alsoyour position in the company.

Lastly, could you please clarify which country's laws will governour agreement? It's important for me to know the legal framework under which wewill be operating. This will depend where the funds left last from maybeCanada or would you prefer other country however, I promise you it has nothingto do with government involvement.

Thank you again for considering me as a potential partner in this venture. Ilook forward to hearing back from you with more details.

Upon hearing from you, I will direct you further.
Regards

Mr Ngosi

subject: Re: Further Explanation my response on green
body:
Hello Mr. David,

Thank you for reaching out to me with your proposal. I must say, I appreciate your experience and expertise in retirement planning. It is definitely an important aspect of life, and it's great that you have been able to generate high profits for your clients.

I understand that you are offering me an opportunity to receive funds as my annual investment proceeds from Fidelity Marginal. It's interesting that you mentioned the funds will be sent via a diplomatic courier to avoid government taxes. Could you please explain how this works? I want to make sure everything is legal and have the trust or words of renowned wealth management agent with Tdbank, tested and tried. I'm sure he will deliver when it comes to delivering his part without any doubt.

You also mentioned that there might be some minimal financial costs involved in the claim process. Could you provide more details about these costs? I would like to have a clear understanding of what expenses I would need to cover. To be honest with you, the last time we did this, it cost the EMRCP CLIENT approximately $10,000 for complete paperwork including bank clearance papers that were also procured by the wealth manager legally and up to the last detail. Actually, I was thinking of directing you to him directly so he can provide all necessary advice. I assure you we will never go wrong.

I would appreciate it if you could share more about the investment pattern or sharing options once the funds are in my account. What kind of investments do you typically recommend, and how would we proceed with making those decisions? I have instructed my lawyer to draft a private agreement which we will both sign that will state all details in black and white before we go to the wealth manager. So upon hearing from you, I will need the below details:

- Your house or office address
- Any of your documents
- Your company name and also your position in the company

Lastly, could you please clarify which country's laws will govern our agreement? It's important for me to know the legal framework under which we will be operating. This will depend on where the funds last came from or would you prefer another country? However, I promise you it has nothing to do with the government.

Thank you again for considering me as a potential partner in this venture. I look forward to hearing back from you with more details.

Upon hearing from you, I will direct you further.

Regards,
Mr.

Best wishes,
David

subject: Re: MORE INFO
body:
Hello Mr. David,

Thank you for reaching out to me with your proposal. I must say, I appreciate your experience and expertise in retirement planning. It is definitely an important aspect of life, and it's great that you have been able to generate high profits for your clients. I am sure we can partner together on this project.

I understand that you are offering me to receive a certain amount of funds as my annual retirement income from Fidelity Marginal Capital Fund. It's interesting that the fund will be sent via charity donation to avoid government scrutiny. Could you please explain how this process works? I want to make sure it is legal and have the trust or words of management agent with TD Bank, as you mentioned. Have they been tested and tried? Can I be sure that they will deliver their part without any doubt?

You also mentioned that there might be some minimal financial costs involved in the claim process. Could you provide more details about these costs? I would like to have a clear understanding of what expenses I would need to cover. To be honest with you, the last time we did something similar, it cost around plus minus  to complete paperwork including bank fees, which was also procured by the wealth manager legally and honestly. Actually, I was thinking of directing you to him directly so he can take it up with you and provide all necessary advice. I assure you we will never go wrong.

I would appreciate it if you could share more about the investment pattern or sharing options once the funds are in my account. What kind of investments do you typically recommend, and how would we proceed with making those decisions? I have instructed my lawyer to draft a private agreement which we will both sign that will state all details clearly before we go to the wealth manager. So upon hearing from you, I will need:

- Your house or office address
- Any valid document from your end
- Your company name and your position in the company

Lastly, could you please clarify which country's laws will govern our agreement? It's important for me to know the legal framework under which we will be operating. This will depend on where the funds last came from, maybe Canada or would you prefer another country? However, I promise you it has nothing to do with my trust in you.

Thank you again for considering me as a potential partner in this venture. I look forward to hearing back from you with more details. Upon hearing from you, I will direct you further.

Regards,
Mr.

Best wishes,
David

body:
Hello Mr. David,

First and foremost maybe it’s a mistake my nameis Mr. Henry Ngosi a financial consultant attached with Fidelity and not David.


I assure you this will be done and perfected ina legal and legitimate manner worthy of emulation trust me I have planned andperfected this route all these years am here as a consultant hoping today willcome.

I would like if you can give me your full details andphysical address, names as it is written on your valid license or internationalpassport so I draft an agreement of understanding that will be binding to us inand out of this project I promise there will be no government involvement atall.

In the agreement, it will state clearly what isyour share and participation in black and white to your full understanding.

I am 101% sure that with less than $20,000.00,we will wrap up this project without much stress if you will accept to followmy tested and trusted approach with this company client claiming their EMRCP foryears.

Unfortunately, the laws biding the investment will be theinvestment country of your choice therefore it can be arranged all we want issecurity of funds before and after the funds are wired to your comfort.

I wait to hear from you so to send you the draft privateagreement.


Please keep to your strictest privacy
Best wishes, 
Mr. Henry

subject: Re: good day sir please can you let me know if you are steel with me or not let know what to do
body:
Hello Mr David,
Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciateyour detailed explanation of the project and your assurance that it will bedone in a legal and legitimate manner. I understand the importance of securitywhen it comes to financial matters. Thank you for your understanding.
Before proceeding further, could you pleaseprovide more information about the project, as I said earlier, I have been carefully handling ourcompany client’s capital fund investment with a successful high turn-overexcess profit with retirement on my mind.(PROJECT) and how my involvement would work? Your involvement starts immediatelyI present you as an INVESTOR to receive the EMRCP fundamounting to $22,000,000.00usd(Twenty-Two Million Dollars) as your annualinvestment proceeds from Fidelity Marginal Capital Fund,I have promised toprepare the legal documents from our company legal department.

EMRCP as I explained before, I handle all our investor's direct capital funds andextracts 1.2% Excess Maximum Return Capital Profit (EMRCP) per annum on each ofthe Investor's Marginal Capital Fund. 

For us to proceed on the draft of theMoU please do send to me the below information’s.

 1.     Your house or office address

 2.     Any of your valid identification document.

 3.     You company name and also your position in the company.

 This is 100% risk freetransaction because all legal documents will be legitimized in the court forlegal reason.
Regards,


Henry
